Title: The VoTe room temperature H 2 16 O line list up to 25000 cm -1
Source: Proc SPIE Int Soc Opt Eng
Abstract: © 2018 SPIE. A preliminary version of the line list of dipole-allowed transition of the water molecule is presented. The line lists is created on the basis of VoTe calculations (Voronin, Tennyson et al. in preparation). The cut-of values used for this line list are: 25000 cm -1 in wave number and 10 -30 cm/molecule at T=296 K in intensity. Calculated line-lists are available on the site ftp://ftp.iao.ru/pub/VTT/VoTe/.
